entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ALPN processing on Linux can be improved #58299
    7.0.0
  • Vector256<Byte.WithElement(1235410822): RunBasicScenario failed to throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException. #58295
  • ARM32: Runtime crash with interfaces #58293
    6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source gen containing non-localized error messages #58292
    6.0.0
  • Concatenation of interpolated strings is corrupted #58288
  • Empty string cannot be parsed to a nullable int with System.Text.Json with JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingFromString #58289
  • Consider incrementing the assembly version for source generator with each build #58274
  • Source generator doesn't support [JsonExtensionData] #58273
    6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator not handling converter factories correctly #58267
    6.0.0
  • [dev innerloop] build runtime tests without CoreCLR #58266
  • Implement 128-bit Multiply intrinsic for x86/x64 #58263
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsGC(varDsc) in Checked crossgen over Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.dll #58259
    6.0.0
  • XmlSerializer throws exception on creation if using derived type that only partially overrides a property #58257
  • The SSL connection could not be established after bypassing validation #58251
  • WebProxy method IsBypassed(uri) returns false although uri is in bypass list #58249
  • [API Proposal]: Request to create ChainPreviousMemberNameAttribute like CallerMemberNameAttribute #58248
  • JsonStringEnumConverter ignores 'allowIntegerValues' when deserializing quoted numeric values #58247
    7.0.0
  • What's the difference between UseMonoRuntime and RuntimeFlavor? #58245
    7.0.0
  • Extra file exist check in FileSystem.MoveDirectory on Unix #58240
    7.0.0
  • Remove "requestId" arguments from HTTP tests loopback server API #58239
  • HTTP Cancellation tests should validate cancellation on the wire #58238
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #58235
  • HTTP3: Loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync logic is wrong #58234
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro.sh #58230
    6.0.0
  • QUIC: Add API to allow detecting when peer aborts receive #58229
    6.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.FrameworkResolution.RollForwardOnNoCandidateFxMultipleFrameworks.ReconcileFrameworkReferences_InnerFrameworkReference_PreRelease(versionReference: \"6.0.0\", rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx: null, applyPatches: null, resolvedFramework: \"6.2.1\") #58228
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests are disabled in WASM #58226
    Future
  • `StringValues` implicit conversion to `string` should match `ToString()` #58223

Closed

  • Peeking. This is where pipelines shines, but it’s something needed here and there when working with streams as well. We should look at adding peeking support (reading N bytes without consuming them) to BufferedStream, or implementing a custom PeekStream, or other ways of achieving the capability here. And/or should we consider a mechanism whereby Streams can expose any internal buffer they may have to be examined? #58300
  • [System.Net.Quic]Feedback a phenomenon. #58241
  • [wasm] Require wasm workload, if a native reference is being used #56678
    6.0.0
  • [mono] RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements not supported #58013
    6.0.0
  • [mono] DefineDynamicAssembly ignores PublicKeyToken #58015
    6.0.0
  • Preview 7 Improper LinkTarget returned for a Directory Junction on Windows #57575
    6.0.0
  • Preview 7 inconsistent FileSystemInfo LinkTarget and ResolveLinkTarget results when using virtual drives #57582
    6.0.0
  • [mono] CustomAttrBuilder does not support RuntimeType arguments #58019
    6.0.0
  • Source generator for System.Text.Json fails when generating info for a nested type with same name as another nested type. #57378
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression in string handling / culture ICU #58029
  • [Regions] pCorProfilerInfo->GetObjectGeneration may fail when running under USE_REGIONS #55965
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests hardcode the AssemblyVersion #58175
    6.0.0
  • Xamarin developers get warnings when they call APIs that aren't available on the OS version they target #45193
    6.0.0
  • .NET developers can run iOS and Android apps on emulators and devices in .NET 6 #44654
    6.0.0
  • Track fully enabling libraries tests and enabling missing features for iOS, Android #35410
    6.0.0
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException : The PKCS#12 Exportable flag is not supported on this platform. breaking many tests on tvOS simulator #58044
  • Using GetEnvironmentVariables wipes all envvars #58156
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6: Interop.AppleCrypto.GetRandomBytes fails on all iOS Devices #58185
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Cancellation of response download not reported correctly on server #56129
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] IncompleteResponseStream_ResponseDropped_CancelsRequestToServer test fails #53089
    7.0.0
  • Correctly disposing HttpResponseMessage #58237
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\", expectedErrors: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch) #58231
    7.0.0
  • Massive long running tests on Linux #56477
    6.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Calling a method for the first time after an update crashes the app #57643
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58296
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: add PGO random stress testing support #58294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58291
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58290
  • [release/6.0] Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #58286
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add internal junction support to link APIs #58285
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58283
    area-System.Reflection-mono, 6.0.0
  • roll r2r jobs into crossgen2-outerloop #58282
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #58281
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58280
    area-Setup
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip System.Text.Json tests on iOS/tvOS that don't work #58276
    area-System.Text.Json, os-ios
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58275
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] Schedule HTTP & SSL stress runs for release/6.0 #58272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Migrate LoggerMessageGenerator to IIncrementalGenerator #58271
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove MethodTable::GetClassCtorInfoIfExists (always null) #58269
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix a few corner case overflow operations #58265
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.0
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58252
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Disable JitStress for Github_25027 #58250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Only look for exceptVars when resolving live-out EH vars #58243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add internal AppExecLink support to link APIs #58233
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Don't build ReferenceSystemPrivateCoreLib tests with Mono #58232
    area-Infrastructure
  • [draft fix for 43752] Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel

Merged

  • Enable the mono subset to build on FreeBSD x64 #57027
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Do not pass unnecessary parameter to InitializeDebugVarInfos #58260
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58088
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS (#57101) #58277
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Make JsonGenerator be an incremental generator (#57088) #58278
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • Nullable improvement for `Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegment` #58264
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58152
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • Add internal junction support to link APIs #57996
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #58005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58014
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix regression introduced by PR 55726 #58255
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, runtime-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #58056
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, os-tvos
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58195
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58016
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Avoid a JIT assert. #58127
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58020
    area-CoreLib-mono, auto-merge, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [MacCatalyst] Make AppleCryptoNative_SslSetEnabledCipherSuites check for 32 bit & 16 bit SSLCipherSuite #58182
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add Crossgen2 symbol files to package #58193
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add some v8 flags when running the wasm samples. #58242
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix memory leak in enqueue/dequeue of EventPipe callback data. #58244
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Fix regression introduced by PR 55726 #58201
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use string.Empty for empty string custom arg values #58113
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add test that GetCustomAttribute returns string.Empty #58197
    area-System.Reflection
  • Make JsonGenerator be an incremental generator #57088
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Schedule HTTP & SSL stress runs for release/6.0 #58262
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Migrate LoggerMessageGenerator to IIncrementalGenerator #58068
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58217
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58209
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-build-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Implement Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables for Apple platforms using official API for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #58254
    6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Handle shadowed property names in DiagnosticsSourceEventSource #58212
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58218
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Prevent AV in processinfo2 while suspended on Mono. #58158
    area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • [libraries] Skip System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs PNSE, System.Diagnostics.Tracing and System.Runtime.Extensions test #58210
    area-System.Security
  • Add crossgen-related directories to CODEOWNERS #58246
  • Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58092
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Implement Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables for Apple platforms using official API on iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #58161
    area-PAL-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf to find value for smaller enums #57973
  • Fix trim_youngest_desired #58180
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58194
    area-codeflow

Updated

  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • [release/6.0] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tls resume PoC (server stateless) #57079
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Enable win registry install location for all architectures #57851
    area-Host
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Conditionally build allconfigurations in source-build #58122
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58215
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenabled ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream #58041
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [Stress] Enable POST by disabling InternalServerError suppression #58110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove `Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy`. #57735
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Socket: check connect result when non-blocking connect completes. #57756
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58064
  • [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58192
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • WIP: Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] browser-bench sample URL task argument #57527
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions after updating APICompat that uses references #58208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Seg fault on empty ARM application #1463

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT: Only mark debugger step in/through points on Windows #1467
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1466
  • Fix casing of build configurations #1465
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge main #1447
  • Disable COM specific marshalers on Unix #1464

Updated

  • Collection tests for dfa #1462
  • Move to using the new Roslyn IIncrementalGenerator API for better in-VS performance #1374
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0.1xx SDK branding and manifest #20268
  • Add dependency on Microsoft.Deployment.DotNet.Releases and add darc subscirption #20262
  • dotnet watch does not watch custom file patterns from referenced projects #20257
  • Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions should warn when an old SDK is used #20250
  • Register subcommand for dotnet nuget trust command #20249
  • "dotnet test --blame-crash" swallows first test assembly #20241
  • CancellationToken/CancellatonTokenSource is not extendable. #20233
  • Crash after publishing .net5 console app having C++/CLI dependency #20231

Closed

  • [Configuration] Can't add ARM using UI (#1523) #851
    2.3.0
  • Downgrade warnings in It_publishes_projects_targeting_netcoreapp11_with_p2p_targeting_netcoreapp11 test execution #947
    2.3.0
  • Mirror capabilities from the Windows build script in the non-Windows one #948
    2.3.0
  • [Infrastructure] SDK changes should auto-insert in to CLI #1000
    2.3.0
  • Improve Cold start Build/Publish Performance for stand alone apps #1014
    2.3.0
  • With implicit package target fallback to net461, dotnet add package fails #1150
    2.3.0
  • Review help text #7765
    2.2.1xx
  • dotnetbackground.png is not retina-resolution #8278
    2.2.1xx
  • CLI makes two "thrashing" dotnet/versions changes per build #8452
    2.2.1xx
  • Poor experience with mistyped help attempts #8561
    2.2.1xx
  • Better instructions for using preview SDK's from Visual Studio #8969
    2.2.1xx
  • Cannot run app if NUGET_PACKAGES is set to folder under app #9358
    2.2.1xx
  • Update dotnet-sdk .deb/.rpm versioning to match dotnet-runtime #9456
    2.2.1xx
  • Make 2 tests more dynamic: CLI #9558
    2.2.1xx
  • NetCoreApp2.1 using SDK 2.1.1 package downgrade to 2.1.0 #9575
    2.2.1xx
  • Turn test for 2.1 rollforward back on #9596
    2.2.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web incorrectly sets LangVer to Preview for VB in Visual Studio only #19879
  • When will .net 6 and .net 5 support the comment in the method to display Chinese? #20112
  • `dotnet sdk check` command is not source-build compatible #19761
    6.0.1xx
  • Include additional data in results of ShowMissingWorkloads task for Visual Studio in-product acquisition #20151
    6.0.1xx
  • Cannot install .NET 5.0 on Ubuntu 18.04 WSL #20228
  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #19983
    Discussion
  • How to make NET6 Android Binding NuGet usable on all API levels #19075
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide workload list options only relevant to machine readable #20271
    Area-Workloads
  • Test driven RazorSourceGenerator incrementality #20264
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Disable CA1416 for ProcessExtensions #20256
    Area-External
  • [Blazor] Fixes for RC2 (main) #20252
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support platform discriminator for workload pack records #20248
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Serve aspnet-browser-refresh.js from a rooted path #20267
  • Remove explicitly configured LangVersion from RazorSDK #20247
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add VisualStudioComponentIds metadata for suggested workloads #20200
    Area-Workloads
  • Project Reference support for WinRT Components #20153
    Area-External, Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Do not fail design time builds when there are missing workload packs #20147
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Update global.json #20212
  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • Test driven RazorSourceGenerator incrementality #20209
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • Serve aspnet-browser-refresh.js from a rooted path #20150
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: [Indented Verbatim String] #4013
  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find refs integration tests need to verify navigation works #55978
  • IDE automatically adds async keyword to methods without changing the return type #55975
    17.0
  • Consider listing all feature flags in src/VisualStudio/Core/Def/PackageRegistration.pkgdef #55974
  • VB.NET explicit cast to integer error fix wraps the argument in braces twice #55970
  • "args" variable does not show up in intellisense for top level statements (console template) #55969
  • Solution checksum are busted when build Roslyn in debug mode #55968
  • Avoid duplication of code checking embedded attributes exist for local functions and lambdas #55967
  • Analyzer Improvement for IDE0059 #55960
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error: An item with the same key has already been added. #55955
  • Order "Suppress or Configure issues" sub-actions by severity #55952
  • Detect static fields/readonly properties being used before defined. #55951
  • Provide ability to remove enclosing block without its contents #55949
  • Group Intellisense extension method suggestions #55948
  • Rename enhancements #55947
  • Make the external sources node available in design mode as well. #55946
  • Can we have a search box in the method dropdown #55945
  • Add Link to Quality Rules in the New .editorConfig Viewer #55944
  • Option to suppress C# inline type hints for discarded parameters #55943
  • Convert to switch statement changes behavior #55938

Closed

  • string interpolation and `dynamic` leads to TypeLoadException #55977
  • Rename file to match class name results in exceptions #53336
    17.0
  • Contrast for row is incorrect when selected for Value Tracking #53819
    17.0
  • IDE0130 not showing as warnings in VS 16.10.3 #54617
    17.0
  • __makeref raise csc.exe exited with code -2146232797 #51228
    17.0
  • Single character and/or constant highlighting is not working for Value Tracking #53820
    17.0
  • Value Tracking truncation should be more intelligent #52590
    17.0
  • error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 on switch with type pattern matching and async in release mode. #52639
    17.0
  • Code Style settings with severity "Refactoring Only" are treated as if severity is "Suggestion" #55965
  • IDE0079 false positive for IDE0032 using *in-class* `SuppressMessageAttribute` #55529
    17.0
  • CommonSyntaxTrees getter not found #55954
  • How to add Dynamics 365 extension to toolbar in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2019 #55950

PullRequests

Created

  • Source generators high level syntax api #55984
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Don't add async modifier for void return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Specify forbidden zone for foreach deconstruction variables. #55982
    Area-Compilers
  • Share 'when' expressions in DAGs when needed #55981
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, 17.0.P4
  • Handle XamlDefinition with line and column #55980
    Area-IDE
  • Fix navigation in findrefs #55979
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens: Utilize frozen partial compilations #55976
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add Import Directives to the VS options search text #55972
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE
  • Merge Move Static Members feature to 17.1 #55964
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Move compiler test ref assemblies to NuPkg #55963
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix failure to track async operations #55961
    Area-IDE
  • Move test reference assemblies to external package #55958
    Area-Compilers
  • Load solution options through RoslynUserOptionsPackage #55940
    Area-IDE
  • Move to namespace changes document format #55937
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55973
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add File.Exists check when renaming a file as part of InlineRename #55908
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Synchronizes calls to Environment.FailFast. This helps resolve an issue #55939
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement SpillSequenceSpiller.VisitMakeRefOperator. #55928
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Inline Hints: Removed experimental from the title #55962
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55966
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid calling DefineUserDefinedStateMachineHoistedLocal for fields without long-lived local slot. #55922

  • Revert revert of analysis scope change after exception approval #55941
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move Static Members: Show destination name #55650

  • Typo fixes in docs #55953
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Use Auto Prop analyzer bails out for all attributes #55872
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55959
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55985
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377

  • Fix crash for top-level in unused value analyzer #51761
    Area-IDE
  • Freeze semantics for all branches when asked #55910
    Area-IDE
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052

  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905

  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870

  • Source generators/timing #55892

  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35865
    17.0-Preview4
  • TextMate and Razor SemanticTokens don't use the same classification #35860
  • RequestDelegateFactory should throw BadHttpRequestException when in development to make diagnosing handler issues easier #35858
    6.0-rc2
  • DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware should set response status code from BadHttpRequestException #35857
    6.0-rc2
  • RequestDelegateFactory should return "415 Unsupported Media Type" response when parameter binding and the request isn't JSON #35856
    6.0-rc2
  • Contribute "Ask again soon" support to SemanticToken LSP specification #35854
    Razor.Tooling
  • ProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher has the same thread used for Language Server & VS Client #35852
    17.0-Preview4
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35849
    6.0-rc2
  • Make Blazor component attribute completion prioritize component attributes #35848
    Razor.Tooling
  • Bring Razor Theme definitions out of WebTools, into aspnetcore-tooling #35847
  • New templates have unnecessary using statement for OpenApi #35840
  • Add nullable struct support to BindAsync #35839
    6.0-rc2
  • EmailFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #35836
    Backlog
  • blazor multiple authentication cookie schemes not working #35832
  • Validation data/information for Model not added to Tag when using EditorFor() and EditorTemplates #35831
  • The error message for when calling UseStartup isn't correct #35830
    6.0-rc2
  • Add return types to DI extension methods in SpaStaticFilesExtensions #35828
  • Blazor WebAssembly authentication relaying on archived oidc-clinet.js #35825
  • VM6:1 Uncaught pause_on_uncaught exception in visual studio 2022 version 6.0.0 Preview 7 #35821
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #35820
  • Startup improvement: mvc #35819
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35818
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureServices to builder.Services #35817
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureLogging to builder.Logging #35816
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest switching builder.Host.ConfigureAppConfiguration and builder.Host.ConfigureHostConfiguration to use the builder.Configuration property directly #35815
  • Analyzer: Warn that UseStartup/Configure and ConfigureWebHost isn't supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35814
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Hoist explicit calls to HttpContext.RequestServices.GetService to route handler parameters #35812

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm: debugging broken when referencing @attribute with enum contructor argument #25380
    Backlog
  • Upgrading default Blazor template from 5.0 to 6.0 preview 7 causes fallback endpoint _Host not being found. #35403
  • WebSocket Connection failed: Error during WebSocket Handshake #35850
  • `IDataProtectionKeyContext.DataProtectionKeys` property should have `set` accessor #35599
  • Blazorwasm hot-reload breaks if page is manually reloaded after initial changes #32208
    6.0-rc2
  • Test failure: `StatusCode204StopsLongPollingTriggersOnClosed` #35684
  • HTML rename with '!' deletes other tag #33126
    17.0-Preview4
  • [Blazor Webassembly] Client runs fine on development machine, fails to launch on linux server #35829
  • Razor page runtime compilation not working any more #33425
  • Dashes in a hosted Blazor WebAssembly project name break OIDC security #35337
  • ASP.NET core web api template (.NET 6 Preview 7), when enabled support for docker and has some content in wwwroot folder, throws an exception 'The path must be absolute.' when started from debugger #35834
  • SignalR client callback not firing in Blazor WebAssembly client IF client application was published AND callback parameter type has an Immutable collection property #35598
  • Exception OnParametersSetAsync with CascadingParameter #35696
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer middleware stopped working with the latest build #35809
  • [Feature] Custom route tokens #35661
  • Support Hot Reload for ASP.NET Core for F# #35824
  • JwtBearerHandler logs JWT exceptions as "Error" even if it recovers. Suggesting "Debug" #35766
    Discussions
  • Minimal WebApi host Blazor WASM #35822
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35695
  • Perf regression: fortunes #35789
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35748
    6.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable CA1305 #35867
  • Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35866
  • Log time-taken more precisely #35863
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35861
    area-runtime
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • onBoard package validation #35846
  • [Templates] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates #35844
  • Remove unusued using statement (fixes #35840) #35841
    area-mvc
  • [WIP] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #35823
    area-runtime
  • Stop Serializing Return Values for `InvokeVoidAsync` #35807
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35813
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35764
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Tweak readme for Identity server #35862
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix forgot password/edit profile in B2C template #35843
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Tweak readme for Identity server #35416
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix forgot password/edit profile in B2C template #35811
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35842
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add API parameter description to API description to represent the request body - 35421 #35798
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Update timeouts in Java tests #35687
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 7.0-preview1
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates when making template changes #35783
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine SignalR test #35730
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35742
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Applies API review feedback and removes byte array APIs from the public API surface #35768
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35795
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync #35791
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35803
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35804
    area-runtime
  • Quarantine `CanBindTextboxNullableDateOnlyWithFormat` #34985
    area-blazor
  • Add an analyzer that warns about non-literal sequence numbers #35805
    area-infrastructure
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27

Issues

Updated

  • Fix SOS single file support #2515
    6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cross platform media player #2292
  • dotnet workload install is requiring admin rights #2290
  • [Bug] The specified deps.json does not exist -- MAUI + Blazor stack with EntityFrameworkCore Migrations #2288
  • [Bug] OnMeasure not triggered while dynamically add the children #2283
  • [Enhancement] Color.FromArgb should take each component as parameters of byte #2279

Closed

  • [BUG] xml label element doesn't resize automatically on value updated dynamically #1802
  • [Bug] CollectionView/ListView appears to load all elements in the source before resizing to fit #2109
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] Pages in a NavigationPage appear to jump from a small size to the correct size #2108
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] The application crashes if a Frame is placed inside another one on the main page #2119
  • [Bug] Fix the VS templates #2230
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Changing Grid RowDefinition or ColumnDefinition's Width or Height does not update layout. #2121
    6.0.100-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for JS root components in BlazorWebView #2293
  • Fix issues dynamically adding stuff to a FlexLayout #2291
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [workload] create $(MauiVersion) property #2282
  • [tests] empty nuget.config when building templates #2281

Merged

  • Devicetest button centering #2289
  • [templates] use android:targetSdkVersion="31" #2287
  • Support Min/Max Height/Width on IView #2265
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2277
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add template icons #2278
  • Fix the templates for VS #2276
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • Include Border everywhere #650
    6.0.100-rc.1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use two SQL Server database tables (localhost) at the same time? #25752
  • Owned entity marked as "Deleted" do not show up in their Owners "References" collection #25750
  • Cosmos: `Dictionary<int, string>` properties do not generate any errors, but don't map correctly #25749
  • Mapping attribute to configure a temporal table #25743
  • NotMapped composed property causes all properties load in select statement in EF Core #25742

Closed

  • Cosmos: persist Guids as strings by default #25753
    6.0.0
  • LazyLoaded Properties are not Obfuscator-safe #25720
  • Can't create tables in sqlite file #25694
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert #25712
    6.0.0
  • Frequent deadlocks on concurrent inserts with identity columns #25345
    6.0.0
  • Conversion errors in debugger are unhelpful #25600
  • Conditionally mapping two entities to a base entity #25517
  • "Foreign keys are both mapped to <Table> but referencing different principal tables" on long entity names #25456
  • Runtime Exception when passing Func<Entity, bool> into Filtered Include #25733
  • FK constraint failed when re-adding entity #21949
    6.0.0
  • [Cosmos] ISO date time strings are not read back correctly from the database #25656
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Required navigation properties switched to nullable/restrict delete behavior #24215
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Incorrect behavior of classes with the same name #23981
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query: NRE when trying to project count of navigation typed as ICollection<T> #22701
    6.0.0-rc2
  • TPH inheritance with two properties mapped to the same column but different nullability is not allowed #21384
    6.0.0-rc2
  • efcore and odata: the EDM instance of type [some-type] is missing the property [some-property] #19927
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migrations: Problem with 3 nested levels of owned type properties #25704

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly handle adding optional dependents using table splitting without principal. #25757
  • Resiliency to columns with missing types in SQL Server scaffolding #25748
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25744
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Cosmos: Remove Guid type mapping #25755
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert with non-identity store-generated key #25718
  • Detatching principal keeps track of unreferenced dependents #25702
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25723
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: Disable DateTime string parsing #25741
  • Allow sharing column when properties have different nullability. #25740
  • Adding some regression tests for issues fixed earlier #25736
  • Configure ambiguous navigations with RequiredAttribute #25737
    auto-merge
  • Metadata: Avoid sharing default mappings for entity types #25734
